GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a specific article by its article_id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Gets all comments for a given article

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Creates a new comment for a specific article

params.name: article_id
params.description: The ID of the article to post a comment for

400.description: Missing the required author or body

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Updates the vote count of an article by its article_id.

params.article_id: The ID of the article which will update the votes for.

requestBody.inc_votes: The number the article's votes should be increased or descreased.

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

errors.msg: Invalid: votes must be a number

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment through its comment_id

GET /api/users.description: Gets all users from the database.
